attributes.action: Ask the king to dissolve parliament
attributes.additional_details: We need a general election now
attributes.background:
The labour government is destroying the UK. Causing unrest with our farmers and letting our elderly freeze. They are plunging us into more debt and taxing us more for it. 
They are doing nothing to stop the boats, we are sick of paying for it

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Call a General Election

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
